Connect Wallet
Embed

Include javascript code on your HTML page

<script type="text/javascript" src="https://nectarhub.xyz/embed.js"  ></script>
Options
data-usernamestringYour lens handle. (required field)
data-button-colorhex codeSet the colour of the widget button. Eg: #333.
data-hide-bubblebooleanHide the widget bubble.
data-hide-donate-textbooleanHide the donate text.
data-donate-textstringText for the donation button.
data-iconstringIcon on the widget. You can specify crypto currency symbol. Eg: ETH.
